description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Stick 'Em Up is a kick-ass run'n'gun adventure. It features co-operative four-player gameplay, retro vector-style graphics, and awesome physics. Oh yeah, and there's a selection of weapons to choose from and four different vehicles to drive and pilot. If you don't like your friends so much then you can also play 2-4 player VS, and team VS, too!
description.short: Stick 'Em Up is a kick-ass run'n'gun adventure. It features co-operative four-player gameplay, retro vector-style graphics, and awesome physics. Oh yeah, and there's a selection of weapons to choose from and four different vehicles to drive and pilot. If you don't like your friends so much then you can also play 2-4 player VS, and team VS, too!
